definitions: (of a plant) growing along the ground or other surface by means of extending stems or branches

examples.text: creeping ivy can do damage to the wall surface

shortDefinitions: (of plant) growing along ground by means of extending stems or branches

definitions: (of a negative characteristic or fact) occurring or developing gradually and almost imperceptibly

examples.text: the creeping onset of crass commercialism

shortDefinitions: occurring or developing gradually and almost imperceptibly
